segments.text: The kitchen draws me in with its everyday chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's at the sink, towel in hand, drying away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running, sink full to bursting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's sheeting down, making everything wet and hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, utterly clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, safe for now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet's open, cookie jar tempting the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's climbing high on that flimsy stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It tilts dangerously as he grabs the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's waiting patiently, eyes on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's calm and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secret snack time might end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away from the potential fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone stop them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
